Unusual external connection attempts to.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log for connection attempts from external IPs to internal hosts/ports that are not typically exposed or are unexpected based on known infrastructure mapping. Compare observed external host/port targets against documented internal network services. Use frequency analysis to identify rare connection attempts to these targets or cluster IPs exhibiting this behavior.

Anomalous successful or failed login att.Data: Windows Event ID 4624, Windows Event ID 4625, Zeek conn.log
Anomalous successful or failed login att.Action: Monitor Windows Event IDs 4624 (successful login) and 4625 (failed login) for patterns indicative of credential stuffing or spraying (e.g., rapid succession of failed logins from multiple IPs for a single user, or attempts against a list of users). Identify successful logins from new, geographically unusual, or suspicious source IPs. Use correlation analysis to link failed attempts to subsequent successes or identify patterns across multiple accounts.
